concept.title: About project participants
concept.shortdesc: Project participants are the people who are allowed to manage review projects and comment on documents.

conbody.p: Every review project has at least one document owner and at least one reviewer. When a document is uploaded to , the user who uploads the document is automatically assigned the role of document owner. Document owners may add or remove reviewers for a project, and initiate the Prepare Next Draft process.
Usually, the author is also the document owner; however, the user who uploads a document may also assign a different user to be document owner.
A review project may have more than one user assigned the role of author, as documents may be authored by more than person.
